name: Lumin (demo)
description:
(Full 200 levels available on the Google Play Store)

Each level has a scatter of light nodes that you'll need to connect to make sure no node is left unlit.

This game involves your memory to keep track of how the light flows in the level. And the satisfaction of confirming your path as the right one.

The game has 200 levels in the base pack with more on the way.

Every few levels introduces a new game mechanic to keep the game lively and fresh.
